Package geometries

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
renderer.SceneObject
geometries.Shape
geometries.Plane
public class Plane
extends Shape
The Plane class is a geometry that extends the abstract Shape class which has the abstract method 'intersects' to see if a ray intersects with a geometry.
Author:
Timothy
See Also:
Shape

    • normal

      private Vector3D normal

  • Constructor Details

    • Plane

      public Plane​(Vector3D position, Vector3D normal, Color color, float reflection)
      Create a new Plane object with the specified position, a normal, a color and a reflection value.
      Parameters:
      position - A Vector3D object representing the planes position.
      normal - A Vector3D object representing the planes normal.
      color - A Color object representing the planes color.
      reflection - A double value representing the planes reflection value.
      See Also:
      Vector3D, Color

  • Method Details

    • intersects

      public RayHit intersects​(Ray ray)
      Override abstract parent class' intersects method to see if the ray intersects with the Plane geometry.
      Specified by:
      intersects in class Shape
      Parameters:
      ray - A Ray object representing the ray to check for intersection.
      Returns:
      A RayHit object which contains information about the intersected plane and the intersection point.
      See Also:
      Ray, RayHit
